activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6993
activity.text:
@aparnacoronasafe 
Please correct me if I'm misunderstanding your second statement.
> Add a card in patient dashboard "update" tab, under Basic information, before "Symptoms" . Title of the card must be "Perinatal Status" containing the information on whether the patient is antenatal (date of last menstruation) and post-partum (with date of delivery)

The place where you are suggesting to add the "Perinatal status" card is only shown when a consultation if filed for patient. (check the link you provided - it says consultation). We are currently collecting the perinatal details per patient and not per consultation. So showing it only when consultation is created seems odd to me. I realized this only when writing tests that I'll have to first create a consultation in order to verify perinatal info.

I think it'll be more appropriate to add the details in "Medical" card (see the screenshot). We are already showing is "Is pregnant" field there. Let me know what you think. Thanks.

![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/56870381/c8d781b4-ebdf-4a62-a512-cde43392a0f5)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care#1889
activity.text: @DraKen0009 make sure to set  variable `export CARE_API=http://localhost:9000` on terminal before you run `npm run dev`. Otherwise the api defaults to `https://careapi.ohc.network` and not your local django server.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care#1907
activity.text:
after running the migration, printed the consultation to verify values. just make sure dummy data is loaded before running this migration.

```
from care.facility.models.patient_consultation import PatientConsultation
import datetime

pc = PatientConsultation.objects.all()
for c in pc:
    print([c.id, c.patient.id, None if c.previous_consultation is None else c.previous_consultation.id, c.created_date.strftime("%d/%B/%Y")])
```


activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#7031
activity.text:
Debugged it. So `qParams` is empty when we go back to `/facility/`. The `useFilters()` hook will update url by reading localStorage. but by this time `useEffect()` in `HospitalList` has already batched remove operation for `district` and `local_body` params bacause it found `!qParams.state` to be true on very first render cycle.

Solved this by checking if qParams is empty - in this case we don't remove any params.
Video is updated in PR.

activity.text:
Some mockups as per todays discussion.

Original on Ipad Air
![air og](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/56870381/03cdb09c-ef58-453d-9a36-fa81f6c7f82e)

Reduce padding arounds mews and columize the patient details. Maybe we can leave the chips (age, gender) be a row.

![reduce padding around mews and columize the patient details](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/56870381/f6cb5877-3a48-4f49-95fd-1b57e5202e80)

Using 3 columns. I like this little better. can maybe center the those buttons (edit, log, show more)
 
![3 column way](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/assets/56870381/a2435775-3809-46b7-a174-0fe441484498)

Let me know if there is any other variation I can try. Thanks.

cc: @nihal467

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6659
activity.text:
@nihal46
> once i select it, i can unselect the option, by clicking on the button

Do you mean the button should toggle the `clone_last` variable? 

In that case I think it would have been better to keep it as checkbox, as done in my previous commit. (https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/6659/commits/ad57c3c50bcbd9fd95d843a6f99e137e7f2364ba)

Button is going to be confusing for users. The button has text "Copy values from previous log". If we use this to toggle, we need to change the button text also. What should the text be when button is used to toggle `clone_last` to false? 

PS: Still thinking checkbox is correct control here. In case we still want to move forward with button - let me know what button text should be in both states. Thanks.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6659
activity.text:
@nihal467 The suggestion to use button was for when we had made changes to display the values of previous log in this form. Idea was by clicking the button, form would get filled with previous log values.

After you suggested to revert all changes and just add the description of what will happen I have added just that message "Field values will be copied from previous log update". The form no longer displays what values are being copied. The copying is going to happen entirely on backend.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6415
activity.text:
Hi @bodhish,
Working on your suggestion to use css text-transform instead of `startCase` and `camelCase`. From what I'm seeing I think it won't be able to replace those methods . Correct me if wrong

> Is a keyword that converts the first letter of each word to uppercase. Other characters remain unchanged (they retain their original case as written in the element's text).
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/text-transform

`sampleDetails.status` can have value "COMPLETED". We need "Completed".  `capitalize` class won't do that. Similar issue for `sampleDetails.doctor_name` and maybe in other places.
https://play.tailwindcss.com/wR1YZEkNsO

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#6415
activity.text:
> @Omkar76 wasn't the issue about removing and using custom utility functions instead?
> 
> This PR is just replacing with another package and updating the imports and doesn't make a noticeable difference in the final bundle size.
> 
> We could achieve a much lower bundle size if we built the utility functions within care right?
> 
> cc: @sainak

I believe the size reduction is significant (547 -> 122). We can keep this PR on hold until @sainak has implemented the utilities to replace lodash. If that reduces size significantly more than this we can merge that instead.
